semanticsContract.globalConflictPolicy: If risk signals (timing/communication/conflict) are active, block irreversible recommendations and switch to verification-first actions.
semanticsContract.lowConfidencePolicy: When confidence is low, provide reversible steps only and include explicit recheck checkpoints.

layers.meaningEn: Core constitution alignment between Saju elements and Western elements
answersEn: What is the innate energy baseline?
Where does overload or depletion begin?
layers.confidenceRule: Need day master + pillar elements + dominant western element
layers.conflictRule: When layer1 conflicts with higher timing layers, treat as baseline not immediate action trigger

layers.meaningEn: Role tendencies (Sibsin) mapped to planetary functions
layers.confidenceRule: Need non-empty sibsin distribution and major planets
layers.conflictRule: If layer2 contradicts layer4 risk, keep strategy but delay irreversible execution

answersEn: Which life domain should be prioritized?
layers.confidenceRule: Need valid house coverage across personal planets
layers.conflictRule: Use as priority map; do not override timing warnings

layers.meaningKo: ì§€ê¸ˆ ì‹œì ì˜ ì‹¤í–‰ ë¦¬ìŠ¤í¬/ê°€ì† ì‹ í˜¸
answersEn: What is the immediate risk this week?
layers.confidenceRule: Need current transit cycles plus at least one luck-cycle signal
layers.conflictRule: Timing risk has precedence over opportunity layers for irreversible actions

layers.meaningEn: Relational dynamics from branch relations and aspects
layers.confidenceRule: Need validated relation hits and major aspect mapping
layers.conflictRule: When clash/conflict cells dominate, require communication safeguards

layers.meaningEn: Vitality and growth-stage pattern by life domain
layers.confidenceRule: Need valid twelve-stage extraction from pillars
layers.conflictRule: Low-stage conflict requires load reduction before expansion

layers.meaningEn: Cross of Geokguk/Yongsin with advanced astrology (progressions/returns)
answersEn: What is the mid-long term direction?
layers.confidenceRule: Need geokguk or yongsin plus at least one advanced astrology signal
layers.conflictRule: Use for direction-setting, not same-day execution override

layers.confidenceRule: Need normalized shinsal list mapped to matrix set
layers.conflictRule: Treat as amplifier; must be gated by timing and confidence
